com.polarion.alm.shared.api.model.rp.widget

Interface RichPageWidgetCommonContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RichPageContext, RichPageParametersContext, RichPageRenderingContext, RichPageWidgetContext
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RichPageWidgetActionContext, RichPageWidgetRenderingContext

    public interface RichPageWidgetCommonContext
extends RichPageWidgetContext, RichPageRenderingContext
    Common super interface for contexts used in methods RichPageWidget.renderHtml(RichPageWidgetRenderingContext) and RichPageWidget.executeAction(RichPageWidgetActionContext)
    Since:
    3.9.2
